1. Hello everyone!

    I created this topic to announce that my game Ludo Oasis has been officially released on select stores and is no longer in open beta (actually, as of a few months ago)

    Ludo Oasis is a free dice board game that everyone loves! The voice chat function makes it stand out among many online voice chat games. Ludo Oasis is not only a casual game, it also combines social games and chat online, allowing your family and friends to get together and play games. As we all know, the origin of Ludo can be traced back to ancient India, when it was called Parcheesi or pachisi, and it is a well-deserved leader among 234 player games. come on ludo, Start your social journey now!

    How to play:
    Players choose a corner of the board as a starting point and take turns rolling the dice. The piece must first leave the base, which usually requires a roll of 6. The pieces move according to the number of the dice. If the piece lands on the opponent's piece, the opponent's piece is sent home, Move any piece into the home triangle of the same color to win.


    Things to note:
    1. You can only open the obstacle in front of the end point by knocking down any of your opponent's chess pieces.
